conditions.cnrsUsage: You agree that the provided data will be used by the National Center for Scientific Research (CNRS) as part of the HelloQuitX operation.
conditions.profileCreation: You understand that this data will be used to create your profile on HelloQuitX.

tutorial.title: Step by step tutorial explanation
tutorial.description: Learn how to easily migrate from Twitter/X to Mastodon and Bluesky

upload.title: Import your Twitter/X archive to continue your journey
upload.action: Drop or select your files here
upload.description:
Three data formats are accepted:
- your original X archive if <1GB (in Zip format)
- following.js and follower.js files TOGETHER and unzipped,
- split versions of these files for large archives (following-part*.js + follower-part*.js)

loading.uploading: Please stay on the page, your import is in progress

upload.helpButton: Help with getting your Twitter/X archive
upload.loading-uploading: Stay on the page, import in progress

helpModal.title: How to get your Twitter/X archive?
helpModal.description: To get your Twitter/X archive, follow these steps:
steps: Log in to your Twitter/X account
Go to "More" in the left menu
Click on "Settings and Support" then "Settings and Privacy"
In "Your Account", select "Download an archive of your data"
Twitter/X will send you an email when your archive is ready to download
Once downloaded, you can import the .zip file here
helpModal.note: Note: Twitter/X archive preparation can take up to 24 hours.

errors.fileType: Invalid file type. Please upload either a ZIP file or following.js and follower.js files
errors.invalidCombination: Please upload either a ZIP file, following.js + follower.js, or their split versions (following-part*.js/follower-part*.js)

deleteConfirm.message:
Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone and will result in the deletion of:

â€¢ All your linked accounts (Twitter/X, BlueSky, Mastodon)
â€¢ Your HelloQuitX profile
